posts.post_content:
For sale is a 1908 Dietsche of Detroit HOFer "Wahoo" Sam Crawford.  It has been postally used.  

The price is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid.  Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations.  :rolleyes:  

Please contact me if interested or if you have any questions.  Thank you.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/70110/crawford[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/70111/crawford[/IMG]
I will take it !   Thanks Phil
